ISSUE.TITLE: Google structured data Breadcrumbs - schema change August 2018
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Structured data tests on google report BreadcrumbList problem: “The value provided for item.id must be a valid URL.” https://webmasters.stackexchange.com/questions/117197/breadcrumblist-problem-the-value-provided-for-item-id-must-be-a-valid-url the URL is now the id: to fix edit _ProductBreadcrumb.cshtml add id to span, with url as the value <span itemprop="item" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Thing" id="@Url.RouteUrl("Product", new { SeName = Model.ProductSeName })"> .. and comment out the link item below... @*<link itemprop="url" href="@Url.RouteUrl("Product", new { SeName = Model.ProductSeName })">*@ Jon

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3254 Fixed breadcrumbs structure according to August 2018 schema changing
